    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Religion &amp; Science  &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/religionscience
     </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078844">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078844">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078844">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078844">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078844" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078845">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078845">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078845">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078845">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078845" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078846">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078846">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078846">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Encyclopedias (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078846">
          <div id="boxatt17078846" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130946">
              <a id="link_20130946" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130946,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Published by an academic press. Great for the bibliographies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130949">
              <a id="link_20130949" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130949,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Written and edited by the public. Often includes bibliography.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078847">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078847">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078847">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078847">
          <div id="boxatt17078847" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130926">
              <a id="link_20130926" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130926,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078849">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078849">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078849">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078849">
          <div id="boxatt17078849" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20130956">
              <a id="link_20130956" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130956,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Standard index for religion studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130960">
              <a id="link_20130960" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=hch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130960,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13706517}); ">
               HealthSource
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for nursing, allied health and medicine. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130962">
              <a id="link_20130962" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130962,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286450}); ">
               PubMed
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for medicine. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20130967">
              <a id="link_20130967" href="http://0-www.sciencedirect.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20130967,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religion &amp; Science ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974078}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for health and life sciences. Full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078850">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078850">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078850">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How to determine if a journal is peer-reviewed or not
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078850">
          <p>
           Most research databases have ways to limit a search to peer-reviewed. In addition, an online service called
           <a href="http://0-www.ulrichsweb.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ulrichsweb/Search/advancedSearch.asp?navPage=1&amp;">
            <em>
             UlrichsWeb
            </em>
           </a>
           can assist in determining if a journal is peer-reviewed or not.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078850" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4642692" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17078851">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078851">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078851">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078851">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078851" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17078852">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17078852">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17078852">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17078852">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17078852" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

       printers and screen-readers
      </a>
      or
      <a href="/content_mobile.php?pid=563212&amp;sid=4642692">
       mobile devices
      </a>
      .
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="customFooter">
    </div>

    </div>
